title: 为何我的启动器在ubuntu下不能启动
author: officeyutong
txt_content:
启动代码："java" -Xmx1500M -Djava.library.path=/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/Natives -cp "/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/java3d/vecmath/1.5.2/vecmath-1.5.2.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/net/sf/trove4j/trove4j/3.0.3/trove4j-3.0.3.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/com/ibm/icu/icu4j-core-mojang/51.2/icu4j-core-mojang-51.2.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/net/sf/jopt-simple/jopt-simple/4.6/jopt-simple-4.6.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/com/paulscode/codecjorbis/20101023/codecjorbis-20101023.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/com/paulscode/codecwav/20101023/codecwav-20101023.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/com/paulscode/libraryjavasound/20101123/libraryjavasound-20101123.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/com/paulscode/librarylwjglopenal/20100824/librarylwjglopenal-20100824.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/com/paulscode/soundsystem/20120107/soundsystem-20120107.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/io/netty/netty-all/4.0.15.Final/netty-all-4.0.15.Final.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/com/google/guava/guava/17.0/guava-17.0.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/org/apache/commons/commons-lang3/3.3.2/commons-lang3-3.3.2.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/commons-io/commons-io/2.4/commons-io-2.4.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/commons-codec/commons-codec/1.9/commons-codec-1.9.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/net/java/jinput/jinput/2.0.5/jinput-2.0.5.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/net/java/jutils/jutils/1.0.0/jutils-1.0.0.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/com/google/code/gson/gson/2.2.4/gson-2.2.4.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/com/mojang/authlib/1.5.17/authlib-1.5.17.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/com/mojang/realms/1.5.5/realms-1.5.5.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/org/apache/commons/commons-compress/1.8.1/commons-compress-1.8.1.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/org/apache/httpcomponents/httpclient/4.3.3/httpclient-4.3.3.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/commons-logging/commons-logging/1.1.3/commons-logging-1.1.3.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/org/apache/httpcomponents/httpcore/4.3.2/httpcore-4.3.2.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/org/apache/logging/log4j/log4j-api/2.0-beta9/log4j-api-2.0-beta9.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/org/apache/logging/log4j/log4j-core/2.0-beta9/log4j-core-2.0-beta9.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/org/lwjgl/lwjgl/lwjgl/2.9.1/lwjgl-2.9.1.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/org/lwjgl/lwjgl/lwjgl_util/2.9.1/lwjgl_util-2.9.1.jar";"/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/libraries/tv/twitch/twitch/6.5/twitch-6.5.jar";/home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/versions/1.8/1.8.jar net.minecraft.client.main.Main --username Ted_Master --version 1.8 --gameDir /home/yutong/下载/.minecraft --assetsDir /home/yutong/下载/.minecraft/assets --assetIndex 1.8 --uuid auth_uuid --accessToken 094083bf08e4443994c072dc60ce1e27 --userProperties {} --userType legacy复制代码
我的启动器用java写的，在windows下可以完美启动

replies.txt_content: 楼主听说过ubuntu里的wine吗？ 试试

replies.author: xiaofanhao41
replies.txt_content:
officeyutong 发表于 2015-7-18 21:51
用wine运行win版java不是多此一举吗

replies.author: tdiant
replies.txt_content:
Linux核心的操作系统编码应该是ANSI，Windows的编码是UTF-8，你应该把UTF-8的问题转换为ANSI
还有，能用英文尽量英文

replies.author: officeyutong
replies.txt_content:
tdiant 发表于 2015-7-21 17:50
Linux核心的操作系统编码应该是ANSI，Windows的编码是UTF-8，你应该把UTF-8的问题转换为ANSI
还有，能用英 ...
我最后查出问题了 linux下不能用分号 应该用冒号
还有 这代码直接程序里运行的 java程序默认utf8 你说的完全不对吧？
